translations.text: When the earth is shaken ˹in˺ its ultimate quaking,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: and when the earth throws out ˹all˺ its contents,<sup foot_note=77635>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: on that Day the earth will recount everything,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: having been inspired by your Lord ˹to do so˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ

translations.text: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups<sup foot_note=77636>1</sup> to be shown ˹the consequences of˺ their deeds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ

translations.text: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ

translations.text: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
